Description_lang: The caster is surrounded by $52127n globes of water, granting $52127s2 mana per 5 sec.  When a spell, melee or ranged attack hits the caster, $52128s1 mana is restored to the caster. This expends one water globe.  Only one globe will activate every few seconds.  Lasts $52127d.  Only one Elemental Shield can be active on the Shaman at any one time.
AuraDescription_lang: $s2 mana per 5 sec.  Attacks and spells used against you restore $52128s1 mana.  $n charges.
